name: Black and White
description: Welcome to Black and White. A game of, well, black and white! You wake up in the code of a game. In fact, you wake up in a large RPG. Too bad you're not actually in the RPG. Instead, you're in the code of the RPG, how fun! You've been neglected by your creator for over 5 years. Now you must find your way to the end of the code until it's too late.
